Text.Page:
There's nothing more terrifying than a massive wendigo assault. Their predations grow more bold each day.

We must secure this area if we're to succeed. I need you to slay some {@LinkCreature:34#610#wendigo ragers} and {@LinkCreature:34#710#warlords} to weaken their force.

Move quickly and don't draw them back to our position.
Well fought. While the wendigos are licking their wounds, we can reinforce our position.
